short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cribuzz Dark is an extension for dark theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cricbuzz Dark is a Chrome extension for cricket fans that applies a dark theme to the Cricbuzz website, enhancing your browsing experience.

The current version only provide dark mode for the following three pages:
- Home
- Commentary
- Scoreboard
- Match Squads
- Match Highlights
- Match Full Commentary
- Match Facts
- Cricket series schedule and results
- Series squad
- Series points table

Future updates will bring dark mode to even more Cricbuzz pages!
Feel free to comment down which page do you want in dark mode.
